item.description:
Let's get a little extra dolled up and go out together! There's nothing like an excuse to feel a little better about yourself!! We could meet at my place and then head out to some great local spots in the South End! Nothing crazy, just some good fun!

Come at 6pm if you want to get ready with us, I will have some skincare samples and cocktails for everyone! Meet, mingle, amp up your look before we hit the town.

We will be heading out around 7-7:30pm to some local spots, but we may need to walk a little so....maybe keep flats in your purse!!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: text or call my cell 617-596-5373 for address
item.name: 'Cause it's ladies night!
